summary:
High res Hawk replacement is mod that replaces the very low quality vanilla textures with completely original high resolution ones.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Vaz66.jpg[/IMG]
descriptionHtml:
High res Hawk replacement is mod that replaces the very low quality textures with completely original high resolution ones.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Vaz66.jpg[/IMG]

There are two versions of the texture: normal and red.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LTsEM.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hVCz7.jpg[/IMG]

the normal version is far more grey, while the red version was edited to better suit the look of the original texture.
My schools biology lab was about to throw away a large stuffed bird, but seeing a use for it I retrieved it from its sojourn to the unsanitary reaches of the bin, and took it home. It has now found Its place in the world, being unwillingly used as skin by other birds in a virtual environment, I have found a temporary distraction from unleashing my wroth upon blender as it malignantly refuses to export meshes in any visible form, and you have hopefully received a satisfactory alternative to the mass of pixilation, that is the vanilla texture.

any and all constructive criticism and ideas are welcome, so please dont hesitate to leave a comment or pm me.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yxPum.gif[/IMG]

Installation
 To install, simply drag the textures folder into your skyrim data folder (typically located in C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data) and click yes should any dialogue boxes appear.
Or just click the install with manager button if you have the nexus mod manager installed.

                                              shameless self-promotion
If you like this, why not try my other mod?
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21721][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7pwh6.png[/IMG][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10377][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GhtXc.jpg[/IMG][/url]

click image to go to mod page
author: tehxen

files.changelogHtml:
Fixed potential to cause unnecessary lag.
added optional lower resolution versions of both the red and normal textures.
